scripts.update: npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install && npm outdated
scripts.clear:tags: git tag -l | xargs git tag -d && git fetch --tags
scripts.version: node scripts/update-manifest-version.js && git add ngsw-config.json && git add public/manifest.webmanifest && git add src/environments/version.ts
scripts.version:major: npm run clear:tags && npm version major -m "chore(release): bump version to %s"
scripts.version:minor: npm run clear:tags && npm version minor -m "chore(release): bump version to %s"
scripts.version:patch: npm run clear:tags && npm version patch -m "chore(release): bump version to %s"
scripts.version:premajor: npm run clear:tags && npm version premajor -m "chore(release): bump version to %s"
scripts.version:preminor: npm run clear:tags && npm version preminor -m "chore(release): bump version to %s"
scripts.version:prepatch: npm run clear:tags && npm version prepatch -m "chore(release): bump version to %s"
scripts.version:prerelease: npm run clear:tags && npm version prerelease -m "chore(release): bump version to %s"
